Sentencas: A series of Na2O-MgO-TiO2-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glasses promising as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells are prepared.
Titulo: Thermal Properties of Na2O-MgO-TiO2-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 Glasses and Prospects for Their Use for Sealing Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The glassy state is confirmed by X-ray diffraction analysis, and the elemental composition is determined by inductively coupled plasma atomic emission spectroscopy.
Titulo: Thermal Properties of Na2O-MgO-TiO2-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 Glasses and Prospects for Their Use for Sealing Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) is calculated from the dilatometric data; it varies within (69-77) x 10(-7) K-1 and increases with the MgO to Al2O3 concentration ratio.
Titulo: Thermal Properties of Na2O-MgO-TiO2-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 Glasses and Prospects for Their Use for Sealing Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The CTE calculation by the Appen method gives the results that are underestimated by 5-8% relative to the experimental data.
Titulo: Thermal Properties of Na2O-MgO-TiO2-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 Glasses and Prospects for Their Use for Sealing Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The temperature dependences of the heat capacity of the glasses are determined by differential scanning calorimetry and calculated using the Kopp-Neumann rule.
Titulo: Thermal Properties of Na2O-MgO-TiO2-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 Glasses and Prospects for Their Use for Sealing Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Comparison of the calculated values with the experimental data shows that the Kopp-Neumann rule is observed for the systems under consideration with relatively high accuracy.
Titulo: Thermal Properties of Na2O-MgO-TiO2-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 Glasses and Prospects for Their Use for Sealing Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The sensitivity of different methods in determination of the glass transition point has been evaluated.
Titulo: Thermal Properties of Na2O-MgO-TiO2-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 Glasses and Prospects for Their Use for Sealing Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
